targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(balance) as "Total"
FROM finance.investment

SELECT sum(variationTotal) as "Total"
FROM finance.investment
where priceDay is not null

SELECT (
(select sum(total) from finance.dividends where status = "PAID") + 
sum(variationTotal) + 
(select sum(profit) from finance.transaction)
) AS "Total"
FROM finance.investment
where priceDay is not null and balance > 0

SELECT sum((priceDay - previousClosePrice) * qnt) AS "Total" from finance.view_investment
where priceDay is not null and previousClosePrice is not null and balance > 0

SELECT 
(SUM(variationTotal) / SUM(balance)) * 100 as "Percentual"
FROM finance.investment
where priceDay is not null

SELECT sum(variationDayTotal) AS "Total"
FROM finance.view_investment

SELECT
  updatedAt AS "time",
  priceDay AS "Preço",
  name
FROM finance.investment
where balance > 0
ORDER BY updatedAt

SELECT
  updatedAt AS "time",
  variationDay AS "Preço",
  name
FROM finance.investment
where balance > 0
ORDER BY updatedAt

select
inv.name as "Código",
inv.qnt as "Total de Cotas",
inv.balance as "Total de Aportes",
inv.priceAverage as "Preço Médio",
-- sum(dy.total / 100) as "Dividendos Recebidos",
inv.priceDay as "Cotação Hoje",
sum(inv.balance + inv.variationTotal) as "Saldo Atual",
inv.variationTotal as "Lucro/Prejuízo",
inv.changePercentTotal as "Saldo (%)",
inv.percent as "(%) Da Carteira",
replace(inv.category -> "$.name", '"', '') as "Categoria",
inv.sector as "Seguemento"
from finance.view_investment inv
-- left join finance.dividends dy on dy.investmentId = inv.id
where balance > 0
group by inv.id
order by inv.balance desc

SELECT
inv.name as "Código",
tran.price as "Preço",
sum(tran.qnt) as "Qnt",
tran.total as "Total",
DATE_FORMAT(tran.negotiationDate, "%d/%m/%y") as "Data"
FROM finance.transaction tran
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = tran.investmentId
where tran.id in (SELECT max(id) from finance.transaction group by investmentId) and 
negotiationDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
group by inv.id

SELECT
  dy.updatedAt AS "time",
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Dividendo",
  inv.name as Nome,
  CONCAT('R$ ', FORMAT(sum(dy.total - dy.fees), 2)) as "Valor",
  DATE_FORMAT(dy.dueDate, '%d-%b') as 'Dt Pag'
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PROVISIONED" and inv.balance > 0
group by inv.id
ORDER BY dy.updatedAt

SELECT sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Mês Atual"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where inv.balance > 0 and dy.dueDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

SELECT sum(dy.total - dy.fees) as "Mês Anterior"
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PAID" and dy.dueDate > last_day(now() - INTERVAL 2 MONTH) and dy.dueDate <= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees ) AS "Dividendo",
  "Total de dividendos recebidos"
FROM finance.dividends dy
where dy.status = "PAID"
ORDER BY dy.createdAt

SELECT
  DATE_ADD(even.dateReference, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AS "time",
  even.description AS metric,
  even.link,
  inv.name
FROM finance.events even
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = even.investmentId
ORDER BY even.dateReference

select 
inv.name as "Nome",
replace(inv.category -> "$.name", '"', '') as "Categoria",
dy.price as "Ùltimo dividendo", 
((dy.price / inv.priceAverage) * 100) as "Rendimento (%PM)", 
((dy.price / inv.priceAverage) * 100) * 12 as "Rendimento (%PM) 12M"
from finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.view_investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.id in (select max(tmp.id) from finance.dividends tmp group by tmp.investmentId) and inv.balance > 0
group by dy.investmentId;

SELECT
  updatedAt AS "time",
  balance as "Balanço",
  name as Nome,
  CONCAT('R$ ', FORMAT(balance, 2)) as "Valor"
FROM finance.investment
where balance > 0
ORDER BY updatedAt

SELECT
  updatedAt as time_sec,
  sum(balance) as "Balanço",
  sector as Nome
FROM finance.investment
where balance > 0
group by sector
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  sum(dy.total - dy.fees) AS "Dividendo",
  inv.name
FROM finance.dividends dy
inner join finance.investment inv on inv.id = dy.investmentId
where dy.status = "PAID" AND dy.total > 0
group by inv.id
ORDER BY sum(dy.total - dy.fees) asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por ATIVO

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  sum(total - fees) AS "Dividendo",
  DATE_FORMAT(dueDate, "%m/%y") as "Date"
FROM finance.dividends
where status = "PAID" AND dueDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(dueDate, "%m/%y")
order by dueDate asc

panels.title: Total de Dividendos pagos por MÊS

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   DATE_FORMAT(t.negotiationDate, "%m/%y") as "Date",
    (select sum(t2.total) from finance.transaction t2 where t2.negotiationDate <= LAST_DAY(t.negotiationDate)) as "Total Compra"
from finance.transaction t
where t.negotiationDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
group by DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y")
order by t.negotiationDate asc;

SELECT
   DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y") as "Date",
  sum(total) AS "Total Compra"
FROM finance.transaction
where `type` = "BUY" AND negotiationDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
GROUP BY  DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y")
order by negotiationDate asc

SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y") as "Date",
  sum(ABS(qnt) * price) AS "Total Venda"
FROM finance.transaction
where `type` = "SELL" AND negotiationDate >= last_day(now() - INTERVAL 2 YEAR)
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(negotiationDate, "%m/%y")
order by negotiationDate asc
